title: Update BlogPostLayout spec: embed header in hero
description:
Embed post header inside hero section with background image.

## Design
- Hero: full-width, min-h-[50vh], hero image as CSS background (bg-cover bg-center), position relative
- Header overlay: absolute bottom-0 left-0, max-w-[400px], frosted glass (backdrop-blur-sm bg-black/25), p-6 xl:p-8
- Title: white, smaller (md:text-3xl), thick text shadow for readability on light backgrounds
- Date + tags on single line, text-gray-300
- Tags use dark variant (bg-white/20 text-white)
- Fallback (no heroImage): header renders as standalone block

## Files
- src/components/ui/Tag/Tag.astro — add variant prop (default/dark)
- specs/components/ui/Tag.md — document variant prop
- src/layouts/BlogPostLayout.astro — update header overlay styles
- specs/layouts/BlogPostLayout.md — update visual details

comments.author: Andriyan Ivanov
comments.text:
DISPATCH_PROMPT [merge-supervisor]:

BEAD_ID: workspace-5yh

Task: Reformat all spec files in specs/ to use structured sections formatting.

## Setup

1. Create worktree:
```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:3008/api/git/worktree \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"repo_path": "'$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)'", "bead_id": "workspace-5yh"}'
```
2. cd to the worktree
3. `bd update workspace-5yh --status in_progress`

## Reference Style

Use `specs/components/post/GithubLink.md` as the gold standard. It has:
- Clear heading hierarchy (# Component, ## Props, ## Behavior, ## Visual, etc.)
- Bullet lists for props and behaviors
- Whitespace between sections
- Concise but readable descriptions

## What to do

Reformat ALL spec files in specs/ (except GithubLink.md which is already good) to match this structured style. There are roughly 52 files across:
- specs/Testing.md
- specs/helpers/
- specs/layouts/
- specs/pages/
- specs/components/

## Rules

- Do NOT change any actual content or information
- Only restructure: add headings, bullet lists, whitespace
- Keep it concise — don't expand or add prose
- Convert single-line compressed fields like `Props: x, y, z` into proper `## Props` sections with bullet lists
- Convert `Sections:` followed by dash items into proper `## Sections` with bullets
- Convert inline `Uses: X, Y, Z` into `## Dependencies` section
- Ensure every file has a clear structure: title, path, description, then organized sections

## Completion

After all files are reformatted:
```bash
git add -A
git commit -m "chore: reformat specs to structured sections"
git push origin bd-workspace-5yh
bd update workspace-5yh --status inreview
```

Do NOT add co-author or generator footers to commit messages.
